game2D.objects

Class PlayerShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2D.objects.GameObject
      • game2D.objects.MoveableObject
        • game2D.objects.PlayerShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Katch

    public class PlayerShip
extends MoveableObject
    PlayerShips are game players with input controls.
    Author:
    Fudou

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerShip

        public PlayerShip(java.awt.Point location,
                  java.awt.Point speed,
                  int strength,
                  int health,
                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a player with default 3 lives, 100 health, 100 strength
        Parameters:
        location - Location of player
        speed - Speed of player
        strength - Strength of player
        health - Hit points of player
        img - Image of player
        name - Name of player

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer)
        If the player isDead field is false, draws the player. If the player is respawning, draws the player based on respawn counter
        Overrides:
        draw in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object to draw on
        observer - The image observer

      • damage

        public void damage(int damageDone)
        Default damage behavior is to reduce health by specified points. When health is less than or equals 0, calls the die() method.* Override the method to let the player die.
        Specified by:
        damage in class MoveableObject
        Parameters:
        damageDone - Damage points done to the player.

      • startFiring

        public void startFiring()
        Sets the isFiring flag to start firing

      • stopFiring

        public void stopFiring()
        Unsets the isFiring flag to stop firing

      • fire

        public void fire()
        Fires the weapon

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the location of player to resetPoint, as well as health points. Starts the respawn counter and sets isRespawning true. Resets the weapon to SimpleWeapon.

      • die

        public void die()
        Creates a BigExplosion. If the player has lives left, reset() is called. Otherwise sets isDead true.
        Specified by:
        die in class MoveableObject

      • getLives

        public int getLives()
        Returns:
        The lives left for the PlayerShip

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns:
        The score of the PlayerShip

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the Playership

      • incrementScore

        public void incrementScore(int increment)
        Increase player score
        Parameters:
        increment - The increased score amount

      • setRespawnCounter

        public void setRespawnCounter(int num)
        Sets the respawn counter
        Parameters:
        num - New respawn counter value

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Test if the PlayerShip is moving
        Returns:
        If the up or down flag is set, returns true; otherwise returns false

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable ob,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        update() is called by observable objects (e.g. by game clock every tick). If the player is not dead or respawning, moves the player one step as specified by motion. Fires the weapon if isFiring is true. If the player is dead, removes the player from players list in GameWorld. If the player is respawning, decrease the respawCounter by one if respawnCounter is greater than or equals 0.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(java.awt.Point loc)
        Sets the location of the PlayerShip
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        loc - The new location

      • addScore

        public void addScore(int score)
        Add score to the Playership
        Parameters:
        score - The score points to add

      • isRespawning

        public boolean isRespawning()
        Test if the player is respawning
        Returns:
        True if the player is respawning, false otherwise
